sentences.en: And as the president said last week, no one should bet against the American worker, American business and American ingenuity.
sentences.cn: 此外，正如总统上周所言，任何人都不应该小看美国的工人、美国的企业和美国的独创性。

sentences.en: He had not credited her with that much ingenuity.
sentences.cn: 他真还没料到她还有这样的聪明才智!

sentences.en: Her ingenuity was at work to remedy the injury.
sentences.cn: 她的机灵已经在设法治疗这个伤痕.

sentences.en: Ingenuity in varying tactics depends on mother wit.
sentences.cn: 运用之妙,存乎一心.

sentences.en: Inspecting the nest can be difficult and may require some ingenuity.
sentences.cn: 仔细检查鸟巢可能有困难，也许需要一些巧妙的心思。

sentences.en: Inspecting the nest may require some ingenuity.
sentences.cn: 探查鸟巢是需要些技巧的。

sentences.en: It rose as a monument to human ingenuity immovably firm.
sentences.cn: 它有如人类智慧的丰碑,巍然屹立,岿然不动.

sentences.en: It’s limited only by your ingenuity!
sentences.cn: 被束缚的仅仅是你的独创性！

sentences.en: Louise's ingenuity had been able to do little with this room.
sentences.cn: 露易斯尽管很会想办法,还是没能改变这间屋子的面貌.

sentences.en: My ingenuity is on the rack to find a good excuse.
sentences.cn: 我正在绞尽脑汁找借口.

sentences.en: Philosophy's queerest arguments tickle agreeably our sense of subtlety and ingenuity.
sentences.cn: 哲学上最奇怪的议点也会愉快地引起我们微妙机敏的感觉.

sentences.en: She had the ingenuity to succeed where everyone else had failed.
sentences.cn: 她真是心灵手巧,别人办不到的事她却做成了.

sentences.en: Sitting with my IV drip, I like to think about all the human labour and ingenuity that come together in this medical moment.
sentences.cn: 坐在那里进行着静脉点滴，我想到了所有的人类劳动和独创性在这一时刻汇聚到了一起。

sentences.en: The boy showed ingenuity in making toys.
sentences.cn: 那个小男孩做玩具很有创造力.

sentences.en: The eloquent auctioneer smiled at his own ingenuity.
sentences.cn: 能说会道的拍卖商对自己的口才十分赏识.

sentences.en: Their development still leaves scope for judicial ingenuity and boldness.
sentences.cn: 它们的发展状况仍然给司法上的大胆探索和创造留有余地.

sentences.en: They suppress the ingenuity of our people and businesses.
sentences.cn: 它们抑制我们的人民和企业的创造力。

sentences.en: This might be academic ingenuity or controlled chaos.
sentences.cn: 这可能是技艺上的独出心裁,或者是一种有控制的混乱状态.

sentences.en: We were amazed at the ingenuity with which they solved their difficulties.
sentences.cn: 他们在解决困难中所表现的智慧使我们惊叹[佩服].

sentences.en: You see the ingenuity of the phrasing.
sentences.cn: 你看他字眼用得多有学问.

words.tran_cn: 有独创性的；机灵的，精制的；心灵手巧的

trans.tran_cn: 足智多谋，心灵手巧，独创性，独出心裁，设计新颖，巧妙，精巧
